name: Extended Car Warranty Inc.
description:
Extended Car Warranty Inc. is a Simulation game in which you take the role of a call center agent.

See how well you provide customer service in the call center of the Extended Car Warranty Inc. While you speak with customers on the phone to answer questions and attempt to collect information/payments, you'll be measured on your demeanor, escalation, and accuracy. Do not forget to pay out your debts and bills.

The game is voiced. Therefore, it may be funnier to play with sound.
